name: Fly With The Yellow Crane
description:
Fly With The Yellow Crane is an independent game with a theme of cultivating immortals, a high degree of freedom, an unique plot, and an attribute development type. The main features are as follows:

1. Plot:

  • Solved the ultimate torture of cultivating immortals: where did you go after Flying into the heaven?
  • Nonlinear narrative. There are several main-line tasks and multiple side-line tasks. The narratives of the tasks are relatively independent, and the writing strives for simplicity.
  • Unique plot. Say goodbye to boring plots such as slaying demons and helping others. To be a gentleman or to be a villain? To value righteousness or to value fame and fortune? To eliminate the strong and support the weak or to be self-reliant? All up to you.

2. Gameplay:

  • Semi-real-time, chess-like combat mode. Unlike traditional war chess model, in the battlefield, actions such as moving and casting spells will not suspend the timing and actions of others, greatly speeding up the game process.
  • A variety of genres, each with its own characteristics. Metal, wood, water, fire, soil, harmony and no attribute. Metal: Ignore the mana shield; Wood: poison + debuff; Water: high magic defense + recovery; Fire: high burst + high singing sequence; Earth: high physical defense + high movement sequence + hitback; Harmony: Almighty .
  • Multiple initial character data can be selected, and more powerful data can be unlocked with achievements.
  • Lifespan: It can be improved with the rank. Training, fighting and flying all take time. Time must be allocated reasonably to pass the game.
  • The year and month of passing game will be kept as a record (locally). The time can be bragged about.
Other gameplay methods can be explored in the game.

You can't have your cake and eat it too. This game has no value orientation. If you choose the option that is widely praised in the secular sense, it may increase the difficulty of the game, and you may not be able to pass the game in the extremely difficult mode. But if you killing too much, it will greatly increase the difficulty of game!
As an independent game, we regret that we cannot present a visual feast. But our gameplay and plot will bring you a unique experience.QQ group：704550905. Bugs can be reported in the group.
